text: hi everyone I'm Robin and I'm gonna tell
you a story of something that happened
to me about ten or eleven years ago when
I first came to Korea at that time I
used to teach at an adult hog one okay I
used to teach adults very early in the
morning my first class was at 6:30 a.m.
in one of my first classes I had an
adult couple now they were married and
they were in their 40s so they were
around 45 I would guess I don't know for
sure and I was new to Korea so they were
very friendly to me actually and you
know when I wasn't working they used to
take me some places and show me around
Korea they're very very nice and
certainly a few times I went to their
house I met their kids I had dinner so
we became very close
well after we became close the father
the husband he started to become really
really friendly with me and every
morning when he saw me he used to hit my
ass okay so every morning he would say
hi Robin and he would slap my ass okay
now coming from Canada we you know we
don't like touching between people even
our friends we don't like touching
touching shoulders touching hands
anything like that especially man-to-man
okay so he started to hit my ass and I
felt really really uncomfortable why is
he hitting my ass anyway every morning
he would say hi Robin and you'd hit my
ass so I felt oh very strange
uncomfortable I didn't like it but I
could tell him you know stop it you know
I felt made me I'd be very rude to him
he's been so kind to me so what I would
do you know he would come in the morning
and I used to stand up against the wall
you know and I would think okay my ass
is facing the wall he can't he
anyway he would come in he would say hi
Robin and he'd still get his hand around

hope you enjoyed it
